text: Avanitame maraivanavarrin tiravukolkal irukkinrana. Avarrai avananri evarum ariyar. Melum karaiyilum katalilum ullavarraiyellam avan arivan; avan ariyamal or ilaiyum utirvatillai. Pumiyin (alattil atarnta) irulkalil kitakkum ciru vittum, pacumaiyanatum, ularntatum (entap porulum) telivana (avanutaiya) pativettil illamalillai
